mutations.name: Mythic Apex Hunter
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior into that of a godlike hunter with perfect predatory instincts
mutations.effectDescription: Achieves perfect hunting efficiency with supernatural speed and precision

mutations.name: Mythic Collective Consciousness
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior into a transcendent hive mind with shared consciousness
mutations.effectDescription: All particles share a single consciousness with perfect coordination and instantaneous communication

mutations.name: Mythic Omniscient Strategist
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior to achieve near-omniscient strategic planning
mutations.effectDescription: Predicts and counters all possible threats with perfect strategic planning

mutations.name: Mythic Divine Protector
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior into that of a divine guardian with perfect defensive capabilities
mutations.effectDescription: Creates impenetrable defenses that adapt instantly to any threat

mutations.name: Mythic Quantum Intelligence
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior to operate on quantum principles, processing all possibilities simultaneously
mutations.effectDescription: Processes all possible outcomes simultaneously and selects optimal actions with perfect efficiency
